title: Handwritten / Script
content:
Hey guys, I'm designing a logo for a client who has a desire to communicate a humanistic essence to her product, which is homemade protein bars for the health-conscious.

Can you help me by identifying this font, or suggesting similar alternatives please?

Appreciate the help!

Paul

Font: 

 Letrista Script 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114710/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-10-03 at 19.52.54.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114710/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-10-03%20at%2019.52.54.png) | 1 MB |
author: paul_w

comments.content:
Most probably hand-done by [Jacob Boyles](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114710/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fdribbble.com/shots/1341397-Broad-River-Roasters).  
Alternatives: [Emil Bertell of Fenotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114710/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Fenotype) (Peaches and Cream, No. 7, Salamander, In and Out, Bonbon, Powder Script, The Carpenter...), [Calderon Estudio](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114710/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Calderon_Estudio_TypeFFoundry) (Letrista, Tulipan), [Dave Rowland of Schizotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114710/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Schizotype) (Ollie, Gelato, Streetscript), [Mika Melvas](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114710/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Mika_Melvas) (Sanelma, Signalist, Santelli), [Nabila](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114710/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fcreativemarket.com/artimasa/60790-Nabila), [Roverd](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114710/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fcreativemarket.com/dexsarharryfonts/28507-Roverd), [Everglow](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114710/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fcreativemarket.com/Seniors/60334-Everglow-Script),

This is **[Letrista Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114710/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.myfonts.com/fonts/calderon-estudio-type-foundry/letrista-script/)** by Felipe Calderón [2012]  
If you check stylistic alternates & swash glyphs you can find all letter variations used in your sample:  
 [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/calderon-estudio-type-foundry/letrista-scr...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114710/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/calderon-estudio-type-foundry/letrista-script/regular/glyphs.html "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/calderon-estudio-type-foundry/letrista-script/regular/glyphs.html")
Ah, was half wrong, that's actually Letrista. Thanks Fivos for the positive identification.
